premium.question: Amount Paid but not get Upgraded?
premium.answer: Share the email I'd that's linked to your WhatsTool profile with our customer support and ask to upgrade your account (attach a screenshot of payment as well).

premium.question: I've Changed my device and my premium plan is lost?
premium.answer: Ask the customer support to remove the previously linked devices and to add premium on your new device,Share your linked email I'd along.

premium.question: Ads are still showing even after upgrading the plan?
premium.answer: Close the application and then reopen it,Ads will get removed. If any guidance needed with Ads, ask the customer support for proper guidance.

premium.question: Unable to send Bulk Automatic Messages through CSV?
premium.answer: The CSV file with numbers must have the country code added before the numbers but without the + sign.

premium.question: My debit/credit card is not working for payment... Unable to pay for the plan?
premium.answer: Please make sure that you've installed the application from play store only, if you've installed it from play store and it's still not passing through then Firebase might be banned in your country, in that case connect to VPN and then retry.
